resources.string: Keeping up to date is important. New system software is available and is now downloading. It will be applied automatically once the download is complete
There was a problem downloading the software update. Due to the importance of the update, it will need to be applied before you are able to continue.
Verify your network settings and try again.
New system software has been downloaded. Your device will automatically restart to install the update.
Keeping up to date is important. New system software is available and is now downloading. It will be applied automatically once complete.
